pages.text: Paralysis is an ability that gives gems a special emotional outburst, as when they outburst, enemies around them are paralyzed for a short time.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Aquamarine$(br2) Gems that have a chance to have it $()$(li)Ruby$(li)Obsidian$(li)Spodumene$(li)Topaz$(br2)
